Title: Relates to modernizing and increasing the transparency of local government procurement of goods and services
Summary: Enacts the "local government procurement modernization and transparency act" to modernize and increase the transparency of local government procurement of goods and services; allows a political subdivision to provide notice of requests for bids by posting the requests on the New York state contract reporter website; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง103, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to modernizing and increasing the transparency of local government procurement of goods and services
